sentences.en: Answer: Obviously now power cut, you why not does headrest switch sleep?
sentences.cn: 答: 明明现在停电, 你为何不头枕电闸睡觉?

sentences.en: Front comfortable seats for 18 adjustment with memory function, Headrest electrically adjustable.
sentences.cn: 前排舒适型座椅18向电动可调,带记忆功能.

sentences.en: My head snapped back against the headrest.

trans.tran_en: the top part of a chair or of a seat in a car, plane etc that supports the back of your head
